pages.title: Chisel
pages.text: $(l)(Not to be confused with Chisels & bits)$()$(br2)Chisel adds a huge variety of decorative blocks to the game. The mod is very useful for people who like the construction aspect of Minecraft.$(br)Access to new blocks is provided mostly through one tool, the chisel.

pages.title: The iChisel
pages.text: A more sophisticated version of the Chisel tool, named the iChisel. It is spring-loaded with many helpful features and chisel modes. Experiment around with it! :)

pages.title: The Ender Offset Wand
pages.text: Some blocks have a texture that spans over multiple blocks.$(br)The Ender Offset Wand can be used to shift a texture up or down and left or right.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: The core of this mod is centered around the chisel GUI by right clicking a chisel. $(b2)Place a block in the chiseling slot (top left) and it will list variants of the block in the same group. conversion is 1:1 and can be contiually chiseled at any time. Chisels durability is used up on every conversion.
